name: Block Breaker (Bakstab)
description:
To play: Right Click on the downloaded folder. Then click 'Extract All'. Open the extracted folder and click on the Application file. And Enjoy!

This is my first ever project. I am doing Ben Tristem's course on Unity 2d. (Please dont copyright me). Just wanted to share. It is just a retro classic remake of a Block-Breaker game.

Support Ben Tristem
Link: https://www.udemy.com/share/101WYy2@PW5KV2FKS1EHcUNCBnN1VBRuY1RL/
